name: Igor Engraver File
summary: Learn about .IGR files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: IGR files can be used by both the Windows and Mac versions of Igor Engraver. However, when saving files on Mac, the file may not have an extension. Therefore, to use the file in Windows, add the ".igr" extension.
NOTE: The Mac version of Igor Engraver is only available for Mac OS Classic.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
